terms.pageSubtitle: Clear terms for a great and trusted experience on "Tashtiba"

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to "Tashtiba". By using this site, you agree to these terms which form the basis of a clear and trustworthy relationship.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.platformDesc: Refers to our website and platform.
definitions.userDesc: Any person who visits or uses the site's services.
definitions.supplierDesc: Any party showcasing its products on the platform.

usage.title: Website Usage
usage.content: Please use the website for lawful purposes only, and avoid posting illegal or harmful content.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for keeping your account information confidential. We reserve the right to suspend any account violating our terms to ensure everyone's safety.

products.title: Information & Products
products.content: We strive for accuracy, but prices or specifications may change. We are not liable for unintended errors in product descriptions.

copyright.title: Copyrights
copyright.content: All content on this site is owned by "Tashtiba". Copying or using any part of it without prior written permission is strictly prohibited.
